doc.str: The present invention provides apparatus and methods for detection of an analyte in liquid chromatography with increased detection sensitivity and signal resolution.

Davis, M. T., et al., Variable flow liquid chromatography-tandem mass spectrometry and the comprehensive analysis of complex protein digest mixtures, J. Amer Soc Mass Spectrom, 1997;8:1059-69. cited by other . | Rabbany, S.
